statements: SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_id = 100
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM security_events WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM security_events GROUP BY event_type
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE user_id IN (5, 8, 10) AND event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp, user_id, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_id = 1
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND event_timestamp <= '2022-12-31 23:59:59'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM security_events GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_events DESC
SELECT * FROM login_attempts;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, status FROM login_attempts WHERE status = 'failed';
SELECT id, timestamp, ip_address FROM login_attempts WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM access_permissions_changes ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_permissions_changes WHERE action = 'update' AND user_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts WHERE status = 'failed' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS attempts FROM login_attempts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_attempt FROM login_attempts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM access_permissions_changes WHERE action = 'update' AND JSON_CONTAINS(keys(previous_permissions), 'admin');
SELECT ip_address, COUNT(*) AS attempts FROM login_attempts GROUP BY ip_address ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM access_permissions WHERE permission_type='admin';
SELECT id, description FROM security_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_permissions WHERE user_id=100 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM security_logs;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM access_permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT id, event_type, timestamp FROM security_logs WHERE event_type = 'Login Failed' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM access_permissions WHERE permission_type = 'Admin' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM security_logs WHERE description LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM security_events;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_time FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login';
SELECT * FROM login_attempts ORDER BY attempt_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM access_permissions WHERE permission_type = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE action_type = 'Delete' ORDER BY action_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT action_type, action_time, action_description FROM audit_logs WHERE action_type = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY action_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, event_type, event_time FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'SECURITY_BREACH' AND event_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT permission_type, permission_time FROM access_permissions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' ORDER BY permission_time ASC, permission_id DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_description, event_time FROM security_events ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_login_attempts;
SELECT id, timestamp, success FROM audit_access_permissions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT event_type, timestamp FROM audit_table_changes WHERE table_name = 'users' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, description, timestamp FROM audit_security_events WHERE user_id = '2f9fe84e-5c93-4cf3-9448-6b900873b77b' AND event_type = 'login';
SELECT change_type, COUNT(*) AS change_count FROM audit_database_changes GROUP BY change_type HAVING change_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_login_attempts WHERE success = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, event_type, user_id FROM audit_access_permissions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND action = 'update';
SELECT description, user_id, timestamp FROM audit_security_events WHERE user_id = 'e5d9c928-ae84-4f77-8a09-ff7a387227fd' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT table_name, action, timestamp FROM audit_table_changes WHERE action IN ('insert', 'update') AND timestamp < '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, event_type, change_type FROM audit_database_changes WHERE table_name = 'users' AND change_type = 'delete' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
